reviews.text: This hotel Is situated in aksaroy not sultanahmet as travel republic say. It's in the middle of a at full of shops Ellington car parts.
reviews.title: Not great

reviews.text: The room is basic with no tea and coffee making facilities.
reviews.title: not a four star

reviews.text: The breakfast is good and the spa area is very clean.
reviews.title: The city hotel, istanbul

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The car service we booked through the hotel to take us to the airport at 5am did not turn up.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: If you want hotel that is value for money but not quite central then this hotel is ok. But just ok.
reviews.title: Excellent location and nice room
